basics.name: Igor Dimcevski
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Waiting for the inspiration to pop, while I hop, with my hands on the keyboard job.

work.summary: Part of an insurance company software. To be more specific the data collecting, report generating and dashboard parts of the system.
highlights: MS Word extension for report generation.
Data collector web application that was used later for report generation.
Dashboard creator and loader using DevExpress.

work.summary: Endava is a multinational corporation with world wide spread offices. It’s a large outsourcing organization that is based on several core values that all employees must have. My job there was to work on several projects (but one at a time), some commercial, some internal and one research project. Working with great people with lots of experience is what I found there and I have consumed much knowledge during my stay. Of that I am grateful.
highlights: Middleware software for a large insurance company.
Application for launching games and keeping track of statistics for a nonprofit organization.
Web based game for a nonprofit organization.
HoloLens Kanban whiteboard - proof of concept application.

work.summary: We always remember our first time. So I remember “Aspekt” as my first professional programming experience. Large microcredit/leasing COTS is what I found there in the beginning. Started with development on new features and fixing stuff as a junior, to upgrading the whole system to a newer platform as a semi – senior. Of course I was not alone there, we were a whole team of developers, supported by business analysts and project managers, backed by some large microcredit / leasing clients.
highlights: Started with development on new features and fixing stuff as a junior, to upgrading the whole system to a newer platform as a semi – senior.
One of the core developers on the project.
Supported the project until everything was delivered and operating as expected.

education.institution: University Sts. Cyril and Methodius - Skopje, Macedonia

references.name: Marko Manchev
references.reference: Dimcevski is a highly motivated developer who never steps back at any tasks, regardless of their difficulty. The modern day geek which is highly sought for in any shop/company carries with him his knowledge, experience and fearlessness, along with a high sense of awareness to new ways of solving old problems. Therefore, if knowledge, experience, fearlessness and a new way of thinking and problem solving is what you are seeking for, Dimcevski is your go-to developer.
